title: Just 5% of annual electricity use by India's top 33 companies comes from renewables: Report
description: A report by Climate Risk Horizons revealed that India's leading 33 companies sourced about five percent of their annual electricity from renewables. The study examined key sectors and found slow progress towards renewable energy and decarbonisation targets, indicating that many companies are far from achieving their stated goals.
